data.message: I think what this bitch meant to say is you are so smart and so handsome and so funny. And if she took 10 minutes to listen to your music rather than judge you, she would also say you are so talented and have over come more adversity than she said could even fathom... And behind the fuck you's and "I'm going to slit Kim's throat.." is a big compassionate heart that's going to do more than just help someone really in need of it... Also your voices and the way you speak is literally music to my ears.. And I'll bake shitty ass cookies of anyone who tells you otherwise. #StanOverAndOut also #Happybirthay
